greetings: Hi, I'm Piotr. Nice to meet you.
about: I’m a fourth year Information Technology student at Technical University of Lodz. Creating sleek applications and websites that live on the web is my passion. I’m quick to find my footing in new technologies and adapt to the challenges I face in my work. I effectively collaborate in a team and communicate with external partners.

skills.part2: The ones who visit less often
